cellery

Class CellularAutomata

  • java.lang.Object
    • cellery.CellularAutomata
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CellularAutomata1D, CellularAutomata2D

    public abstract class CellularAutomata
extends java.lang.Object
    CellularAutomata is an object that can evolve Cells contained within a CellArray2D or CellArray1D.
    Author:
    Zach Tidwell
